## Source: ossf-package-analysis (eb5daaded20e2143b5c1c293f3cacb3b702abaf0a14a1922a7d0ff1a42648cf5)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'azure-arm-parameterflattening' @ 5.1.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
